en: He wants to go to school in Canada.
cn: 他想去加拿大学校上学。

en: He will go home on June 25.
Li Ming's plane will arrive at five o'clock.
cn: 李明的飞机将在五点到达。

en: Did you have a good trip?

page: and a bathroom on the first floor.
column8: 一楼有一间客厅、一间厨房和一间浴室。

en: There are four bedrooms and a study on the second floor.
cn: 二楼有四间卧室和一间书房。

en: I make lunch in the kitchen.
I do my homework in the study.
What would you like for breakfast

column8: 请给我一些鸡蛋、面包和果汁。

en: What would you like for breakfast
I'd like some milk and bread
page: 请给我一些牛奶和面包。

en: The juice is in the fridge.
Mum is cooking eggs in the kitchen.
Let's put some dishes on the table.
cn: 我们把一些盘子放到桌子上吧。

en: What would you like for breakfast?

page: 我想要一些面包、鸡蛋和牛奶。

en: I only ate an apple for lunch.
cn: 我午饭只吃了一个苹果。

en: Let's help my mother make dinner.
The tomatoes are in the fridge.
The potatoes and carrots are on the table.
cn: 土豆和胡萝卜在桌子上。

page: 史密斯太太，这顿晚餐看起来真不错。

en: Now the dishes are clean and dry!
We are in the living room.
Jenny and Danny are watching TV.
Jenny is sitting in a chair.
Mr. and Mrs. Smith are reading newspapers.
cn: 史密斯先生和太太在看报纸。

en: Lynn and Bob are in front of them.
cn: 琳恩和鲍勃在他们面前。

en: Bob is sitting in a chair.
I'm sitting at a small table.

page: 丹尼，你喜欢这个节目吗？

en: I like to help my mother.

page: 我看到西红柿、鸡蛋和牛奶。

column8: 妈妈说：“小贝姬，别玩盘子！”

en: I put my toy in the toilet.

page: Baby Becky! No! No! Don't play in the toilet."
column8: 妈妈说：“不，小贝姬！别在马桶里玩！”

en: There's water everywhere in the bathroom.
I always have my umbrella on a rainy day.
Li Ming and I go to school by bus.
cn: 我和李明坐公交车上学。

page: 这位是司机斯科特女士。

en: Do you always go to school by bus?
But I often go to school by bus.
I live too far from my school.
Jenny often goes to school by bus.
This is my friend Li Ming.

cn: Li Ming! Nice to meet you!

page: 伍德老师，很高兴认识你！

column9: 我们有英语、数学、科学、美术……

en: How many classes do you have each school day?
Three classes in the morning and two in the afternoon.
Guo Yang often plays computer games.
Guo Yang always has lunch at school.
cn: 郭阳总是在学校吃午饭。

en: Kim never goes to the cinema.
Today is the first day of school.
They are waiting for the school bus.
I often look to the left and to the right.
I always watch for cars and bikes.
cn: 我总是注意汽车和自行车。

en: Sometimes I take my friend's hand.
Don't stand too close to the street.
Now they see the yellow school bus.
cn: 现在他们看到了黄色校车。

en: Always remember to be safe on the way.
The first day of school is always a happy day.
cn: 开学第一天总是快乐的一天。

en: There are four seasons in a year.
There are new leaves and flowers.
The leaves turn red and yellow.

column8: 冬天我戴上帽子、围巾和冬装。

cn: I take off my winter clothes.

en: It is cold and snowy this morning.
Jenny and Li Ming put on their winter coats.
Li Ming puts on his scarf and winter hat
page: 李明也戴上围巾和冬帽。

en: Please put on your scarf and gloves
page: 詹妮，请戴上围巾和手套。

en: Now I'm putting on my coat.
Now I'm putting on my scarf.
I'm putting on my winter hat.
I'm going to take off my winter hat and scarf.
I'm going to put on my winter hat and scarf again.
cn: 我要重新戴上冬帽和围巾。

page: 首先，我们滚一个大雪球。

en: Then we make a small snowball for his head.
cn: 然后我们做一个小雪球当他的头。

en: Can you put this snowball on that snowball?
cn: 你能把这个雪球放在那个雪球上吗？

en: I have two stones for his eyes.
cn: 我用两块石头当他的眼睛。

en: I have two sticks for his arms.
cn: 我用两根树枝当他的胳膊。
这根胡萝卜是他的鼻子。

en: Does the snowman have any legs or feet?
Next we make two balls of paper.
cn: 接下来我们做两个纸球。
we draw a face and make the snowman complete.
page: 最后我们画脸，雪人完成了。

en: Danny is going to teach Li Ming to skate.
I'm going to teach you to skate
Can you stand up on the ice?
And I like the Spring Festival.
I love to swim in the sea.

cn: 我最喜欢的季节是秋天。

en: I like to fly a kite.
And I love to eat mooncakes.

column9: 冬天，冬天，我爱寒冷的白雪。

cn: 我最喜欢的季节是什么？

page: "I am going to play in the snow."
column8: 一天，约翰对妈妈说：“我要去雪地里玩。”

en: Okay, said his mother. "Put on your coat."
Don't forget your hat! said his mother.
Poor snowman! It's cold! Put on a hat!
cn: “可怜的雪人！太冷了！戴顶帽子吧！”

en: He took off his hat and put it on the snowman.
cn: 他摘下帽子戴在雪人头上。

en: I don't think I have a name, said the snowman.
Skate? I don't know, said the snowman.
Do you want to learn? I can teach you, said John.
cn: “你想学吗？我可以教你，”约翰说。

column8: 圣诞节我们有圣诞树、灯和圣诞老人。

en: These are Christmas lights on our house.
cn: 这些是我们房子上的圣诞灯。

en: He is a merry man in red clothes.
cn: 他是个穿红衣服的快乐男人。

en: Children say he brings gifts on Christmas.
cn: 孩子们说他在圣诞节送礼物。

en: We invite our family and friends to our house.
cn: 我们邀请家人朋友来家里。

en: We give our family and friends gifts.
cn: 我们给家人朋友送礼物。

en: Yesterday my dad bought a Christmas tree!
cn: 昨天爸爸买了一棵圣诞树！
I'm going to put the lights on the tree.
page: 首先，我要把灯挂在树上。

en: Then I'm going to put Christmas things on the tree.
cn: 然后我要把圣诞饰品放到树上。

en: The star always goes on top!
Now we put our gifts under the tree.
cn: 现在我们把礼物放在树下。

en: Yesterday I bought a Christmas tree.
cn: 昨天我买了一棵圣诞树。

en: Tomorrow I'm going to put it up.

cn: 史密斯太太买了一条围巾。

en: I brought a Christmas tree to my family.
cn: 我给家人带来了一棵圣诞树。

en: Danny is going to walk to the bus stop.
I am going to bring a star for the tree.
We are going to write Christmas cards to our friends and family.
cn: 我们要给朋友家人写圣诞贺卡。

en: Are you going to send a card
Let's find a card with Santa on it.
cn: 我们找一张有圣诞老人的卡片吧。

en: Now I can write my card.
cn: 现在我可以写我的卡片了。

en: Jenny's family is getting ready for the Christmas holiday.
cn: 詹妮一家正在为圣诞节做准备。

en: Yesterday I helped Jenny put up the Christmas tree.
cn: 昨天我帮詹妮装饰圣诞树。

en: Tomorrow we are going to buy Christmas gifts.
cn: 明天我们要去买圣诞礼物。

en: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
We wish you a Merry Christmas.
Danny and Li Ming are shopping for Christmas gifts.
cn: 丹尼和李明正在买圣诞礼物。

page: 圣诞节期间，商店里经常有圣诞老人。

en: I want to buy some gifts for my family.
Are you going to give Jenny's family a gift?
cn: 你要给詹妮家送礼物吗？

en: Yes! I am going to give them a special gift from China.
cn: 是的！我要送他们一份来自中国的特别礼物。

page: 你好，圣诞老人！圣诞快乐！

en: What would you like for Christmas
page: 年轻人，圣诞节你想要什么？

en: A new car! Ho! Ho! Ho!
Would you like a new sweater?
Some toys? Oh! Ho! Ho! Ho!
This morning we open our gifts!
cn: 今天早上我们打开礼物！

page: 詹妮，这些礼物是谁带来的？

en: I think Mum and Dad brought them.
cn: 我觉得是爸爸妈妈带来的。
琳恩认为是圣诞老人带来的！
看！圣诞老人给我带了玩具！
Li Ming! You have a gift

en: Now I can take pictures and send them to my mother and father!
cn: 现在我可以拍照寄给爸爸妈妈了！
圣诞节是我最喜欢的节日！

en: We are going to invite my aunt
page: 我们要邀请姑姑、叔叔和堂兄妹来吃晚饭。

en: We are going to open our gifts.
We are going to sing Christmas songs.
I want to give my family something special.
cn: 我想送家人特别的礼物。

en: All the gifts are too small!
Anna bought her mother a sweater for Christmas.
cn: 安娜给妈妈买了一件圣诞毛衣。

en: She bought her father a box of tea.
I found a nice teddy bear.
cn: 我发现了一只可爱的泰迪熊。

en: I think Santa was afraid of me.
cn: 我觉得圣诞老人害怕我。

en: We put a star on the tree.
cn: 我们在树上放了一颗星星。

en: My gift is that I love you.
It's the biggest gift of all.
